016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
019import java.util.ArrayList;
020import java.util.HashMap;
021import java.util.Map;
022import java.util.Map.Entry;
023
024/**
025 * A functional group of a fatty acid, it can contain nested functional groups.
026 *
027 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
028 * @author Nils Hoffmann
029 */
030public class FunctionalGroup {
031
032    protected String name;
033    protected int position = -1;
034    protected int count;
035    protected String stereochemistry;
036    protected String ringStereo;
037    protected DoubleBonds doubleBonds;
038    protected boolean atomic;
039    protected boolean stereoBound;
040    protected ElementTable elements;
041    protected HashMap<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> functionalGroups;
042    protected KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups;
043
044    public FunctionalGroup(String _name, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
045        this(_name, -1, 1, null, false, "", false, null, null, knownFunctionalGroups);
046    }
047
048    public FunctionalGroup(String _name, int _position, int _count, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
049        this(_name, _position, _count, null, false, "", false, null, null, knownFunctionalGroups);
050    }
051
052    public FunctionalGroup(String _name, int _position, int _count, DoubleBonds _double_bonds, boolean _is_atomic, String _stereochemistry, boolean _stereoBound, ElementTable _elements, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
053        this(_name, _position, _count, _double_bonds, _is_atomic, _stereochemistry, _stereoBound, _elements, null, knownFunctionalGroups);
054    }
055
056    public FunctionalGroup(String _name, int _position, int _count, DoubleBonds _double_bonds, boolean _is_atomic, String _stereochemistry, boolean _stereoBound, ElementTable _elements, HashMap<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> _functional_groups, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
057        name = _name;
058        position = _position;
059        count = _count;
060        stereochemistry = _stereochemistry;
061        ringStereo = "";
062        doubleBonds = (_double_bonds != null) ? _double_bonds : new DoubleBonds(0);
063        atomic = _is_atomic;
064        stereoBound = _stereoBound;
065        elements = (_elements != null) ? _elements : new ElementTable();
066        functionalGroups = (_functional_groups != null) ? _functional_groups : (new HashMap<>());
067        this.knownFunctionalGroups = knownFunctionalGroups;
068    }
069
070    public FunctionalGroup copy() {
071        DoubleBonds db = doubleBonds.copy();
072        HashMap<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> fg = new HashMap<>();
073        functionalGroups.entrySet().stream().map(kv -> {
074            fg.put(kv.getKey(), new ArrayList<>());
075            return kv;
076        }).forEachOrdered(kv -> {
077            kv.getValue().forEach(func_group -> {
078                fg.get(kv.getKey()).add(func_group.copy());
079            });
080        });
081        ElementTable e = new ElementTable();
082        elements.entrySet().forEach(kv -> {
083            e.put(kv.getKey(), kv.getValue());
084        });
085
086        FunctionalGroup func_group_new = new FunctionalGroup(name, position, count, db, atomic, stereochemistry, stereoBound, e, fg, knownFunctionalGroups);
087        func_group_new.ringStereo = ringStereo;
088        return func_group_new;
089    }
090    
091    public boolean stereoInformationMissing(){
092        boolean missing = stereoBound && stereochemistry.isEmpty();
093        for (ArrayList<FunctionalGroup> fgList : functionalGroups.values()){
094            
095            for (FunctionalGroup fg : fgList){
096                missing |= fg.stereoInformationMissing();
097            }
098        }
099
100        return missing;
101    }
102
103    public void setName(String name) {
104        this.name = name;
105    }
106
107    public String getName() {
108        return this.name;
109    }
110
111    public void setStereoBound(boolean stereoBound) {
112        this.stereoBound = stereoBound;
113    }
114
115    public boolean getStereoBound() {
116        return this.stereoBound;
117    }
118
119    public void setPosition(int position) {
120        this.position = position;
121    }
122
123    public int getPosition() {
124        return this.position;
125    }
126
127    public void setCount(int count) {
128        this.count = count;
129    }
130
131    public int getCount() {
132        return this.count;
133    }
134
135    @JsonIgnore
136    public String getStereochemistry() {
137        return stereochemistry;
138    }
139
140    public void setStereochemistry(String stereochemistry) {
141        this.stereochemistry = stereochemistry;
142    }
143
144    @JsonIgnore
145    public String getRingStereo() {
146        return ringStereo;
147    }
148
149    public void setRingStereo(String ringStereo) {
150        this.ringStereo = ringStereo;
151    }
152
153    public DoubleBonds getDoubleBonds() {
154        return this.doubleBonds;
155    }
156
157    public void setDoubleBonds(DoubleBonds doubleBonds) {
158        this.doubleBonds = doubleBonds;
159    }
160
161    public void setAtomic(boolean atomic) {
162        this.atomic = atomic;
163    }
164
165    @JsonIgnore
166    public boolean isAtomic() {
167        return this.atomic;
168    }
169
170    @JsonIgnore
171    public ElementTable getElements() {
172        return this.elements;
173    }
174
175    public void setElements(ElementTable elements) {
176        this.elements = elements;
177    }
178
179    @JsonIgnore
180    public ElementTable computeAndCopyElements() {
181        computeElements();
182        ElementTable _elements = elements.copy();
183        _elements.add(getFunctionalGroupElements());
184        return _elements;
185    }
186
187    public void shiftPositions(int shift) {
188        position += shift;
189        functionalGroups.entrySet().forEach(kv -> {
190            kv.getValue().forEach(fg -> {
191                fg.shiftPositions(shift);
192            });
193        });
194    }
195
196    /**
197     * Return the total count for the given functional group name, or 0.
198     * @param functionalGroup the functional group name.
199     * @return the total count
200     */
201    public Integer getTotalFunctionalGroupCount(String functionalGroup) {
202        if ("[X]".equals(functionalGroup)) {
203            return 0;
204        } else if (functionalGroups.containsKey(functionalGroup)) {
205            return functionalGroups.get(functionalGroup).stream().map(fg -> fg.getCount()).reduce(0, Integer::sum);
206        } else {
207            return 0;
208        }
209    }
210
211    /**
212     * Returns a copy of the internally used functional groups map, with the virtual [X] group for regular LCBs removed.
213     * @return a copy of the internal functional groups
214     * @see #getFunctionalGroupsInternal() to obtain the internal datastructure by reference.
215     */
216    public Map<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> getFunctionalGroups() {
217        Map<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> mapCopy = new HashMap<>(functionalGroups);
218        mapCopy.remove("[X]");
219        return mapCopy;
220    }
221    
222    /**
223     * Returns the internal representation of the functional groups, including the virtual [X] group for regular LCBs.
224     * @return the internal datastructure by reference.
225     */
226    @JsonIgnore
227    public Map<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> getFunctionalGroupsInternal() {
228        return functionalGroups;
229    }
230
231    /**
232     * Set the internal functional groups.
233     * @param functionalGroups the functional groups to set
234     */
235    public void setFunctionalGroups(HashMap<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> functionalGroups) {
236        this.functionalGroups = functionalGroups;
237    }
238
239    @JsonIgnore
240    public ElementTable getFunctionalGroupElements() {
241        ElementTable _elements = new ElementTable();
242
243        functionalGroups.entrySet().forEach(kv -> {
244            kv.getValue().forEach(func_group -> {
245                _elements.add(func_group.computeAndCopyElements(), func_group.count);
246            });
247        });
248
249        return _elements;
250    }
251
252    public void computeElements() {
253        functionalGroups.entrySet().forEach(kv -> {
254            kv.getValue().forEach(func_group -> {
255                func_group.computeElements();
256            });
257        });
258    }
259
260    public String toString(LipidLevel level) {
261        String fg_string = "";
262        if (LipidLevel.isLevel(level, LipidLevel.COMPLETE_STRUCTURE.level | LipidLevel.FULL_STRUCTURE.level)) {
263            if ('0' <= name.charAt(0) && name.charAt(0) <= '9') {
264                fg_string = (position > -1) ? (Integer.toString(position) + ringStereo + "(" + name + ")") : name;
265            } else {
266                fg_string = (position > -1) ? (Integer.toString(position) + ringStereo + name) : name;
267            }
268        } else {
269            fg_string = (count > 1) ? ("(" + name + ")" + Integer.toString(count)) : name;
270        }
271        if (stereochemistry.length() > 0 && level == LipidLevel.COMPLETE_STRUCTURE) {
272            fg_string += "[" + stereochemistry + "]";
273        }
274
275        return fg_string;
276    }
277
278    public int getNDoubleBonds() throws ConstraintViolationException {
279        int db = count * doubleBonds.getNumDoubleBonds();
280        for (Entry<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> kv : functionalGroups.entrySet()) {
281            for (FunctionalGroup func_group : kv.getValue()) {
282                db += func_group.getNDoubleBonds();
283            }
284        }
285
286        return db;
287    }
288
289    public void addPosition(int pos) {
290        position += (position >= pos) ? 1 : 0;
291
292        functionalGroups.entrySet().forEach(kv -> {
293            kv.getValue().forEach(fg -> {
294                fg.addPosition(pos);
295            });
296        });
297    }
298
299}
